thread.title: Lee
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Lee

author: Lee
title: Lee
text: I phoned in my order of custom cut metal frames and mats. The person who helped me was knowledgeable, friendly and accurate. The order arrived in a timely manner and was very well packed. Everything was in perfect condition and exactly what I'd ordered. I liked that instructions and the hardware needed to assemble the metal frames was included. I also appreciate being able to get some free samples to make decisions from the "real thing" instead of guessing from what things look like on my monitor.
